long_description: Originally designed for Swedish schoolchildren in 1978, the Fjallraven Kanken Daypack has become a well-loved and iconic backpack for children and adults around the world. Made from durable, water-resistant vinylon. Features carry handles as well as minimalist backpack straps. Outside zippered pocket keeps essentials handy. The Fjallraven Kanken Daypack comes in a wide range of colors and makes a great carry-on travel tote. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Originally designed for Swedish schoolchildren in 1978, the Fjallraven Kanken Daypack has become a well-loved and iconic backpack for children and adults around the world.
